Description: Introducing the Cuisinart Triple-Rivet Walnut 14-piece Block Set. This set includes an 8" Chef Knife, 6" Bread Knife, 5" Utility Knife, 3" Paring Knife, All-Purpose Household Shears, Eight 4.5" Steak Knives and Wood Block to hold them all.
Name: Cuisinart Advantage 14-Piece Triple Rivet Walnut Block Set - C55W-14PCB
